subject: Basketball (College)
College Athletics
Health Insurance and Managed Care
Football (College)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: A key front in the effort to reform the N.C.A.A. is medical coverage for college athletes, some of whom have become burdened with costs to treat their injuries.
snippet: A key front in the effort to reform the N.C.A.A. is medical coverage for college athletes, some of whom have become burdened with costs to treat their injuries.
